page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT KING'S NYMPTON
page.content: {Farming,}the main industry of this area requires a smaller workforce in 1985 because it has become a highly mechanised industry.The farmer and his wife run the farm, larger farms employing one full-time agricultural worker. School leavers do not find opporunities in farming unless they belong to a farming family.{West Hele {Rare Breeds Survival Trust}specialises in breeding rare breeds of pigs and in the farmshop sale of high quality pork products. The centre employs five people Three ancilliary {part time {jobs}are found at the{school.}Three part time{postmen}work locally. On the whole residents have to find work in the nearby towns of{Chulmleigh, South {Molton}and{Barnstaple}.There are a few {self-employed}handy men and recently a thatcher.
